text:
The boneyard reeks of burnt marrow and bitter steel. Scattered remnants of knights lie twisted, their armor melted into their bones. Something passed through here—a storm of fire and fury that left no survivors, only echoes. Amidst the rubble, you disturb a mound of scorched remains.

It rises.

From the ash, a shambling construct of armor and embers lashes out with forgotten rage. It carries no banner, speaks no oath—only the will to destroy what breathes. The air grows hot and heavy. You must ready your weapon.
lore: In the final siege, the Pyrekin betrayed their own. Bound by flame, they turned on the Flamebearers in a pact sealed with blood. Their husks now wander—warriors without cause, guardians without memory.
